hero.title: The technology partner your business needs
hero.subtitle: We create custom systems to automate processes, eliminate repetitive tasks, and optimize business management. Our solutions are designed to fit your specific needs. Get in touch and let’s find the right solution for you.

services.title: Custom Software Development Tailored Solutions for Your Business Needs
services.description: We create tailored solutions to automate processes, improve efficiency, and optimize business management.

services.title: Software Maintenance and Support Keep Your Software Running Smoothly
services.description: We ensure that all your company's software is always updated, secure, and running smoothly without interruptions.

timelineSection.title: Steps to Start Your Project
timelineSection.subtitle: Starting a project with us is simple. We follow a structured process to fully understand your needs and deliver the best solution.

steps.title: 1. Scheduling a Meeting
steps.description: We get in touch to schedule an initial meeting where we can get to know each other and discuss the project's goals and expectations.

steps.title: 2. Understanding Your Business Needs
steps.description: During the meeting, you share in detail the specific needs of your business, the current context, and the challenges you face.

steps.title: 3. Situation Analysis
steps.description: We conduct an in-depth analysis of the presented problem, identifying opportunities and defining a strategic approach to effectively address your requirements.

steps.title: 4. Preparing a Detailed Proposal
steps.description: We create a transparent and detailed proposal that outlines the tasks to be performed, estimated timelines, and associated costs, giving you full clarity on every aspect of the project.

steps.title: 5. Project Kick-Off
steps.description: Once the timelines and proposal are approved, we start working on developing the solution, keeping you informed of progress at every stage.

form.name: Your full name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Your message has been sent. Thank you!

webDevelopmentPlans.title: Web Development Plans
webDevelopmentPlans.description: At Capasso Tech, we offer a variety of web development plans tailored to meet the different needs of our clients. From a simple online presence to fully customized solutions, our plans are designed to ensure that your website is effective, attractive, and functional.
webDevelopmentPlans.note: **Hosting and domain costs are not included.

landingPage.title: Landing Page
landingPage.description: For those looking for a simple yet effective online presence, our 'Landing Page' plan offers a custom design that adapts to mobile devices. With a development time of approximately 15 days, this plan includes a contact form, social media links, and optimization for Google.

features.mobileDesign: Custom design adaptable to mobile devices

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: If you're looking to expand your online presence, our 'Growth' plan is ideal for you. This plan includes everything you need to stand out. With Google Maps integration, this plan allows for up to 8 internal pages and is designed to be mobile-friendly. Additionally, we offer Google optimization and a WhatsApp button for greater interaction with your clients.

professional.title: Professional
professional.description: For those looking to take their online presence to the next level, our 'Professional' plan is the perfect choice. This plan offers a fully custom design adaptable to mobile devices. In addition to a self-managed blog and all the features included in the previous plans, this plan ensures that your website stands out from the crowd. We also offer performance and security optimization to ensure your website runs optimally and is protected against online threats.

customized.title: Customized
customized.description: If none of the previous plans fully meet your needs, we offer completely customized web development services. We will work with you to understand your specific requirements and create a tailored solution that meets your goals and expectations. Contact us for more details and a personalized quote.

portfolio.title: Webpage Examples
portfolio.description: Here you will find some of the templates we use to create the perfect website for your business. These are just examples, and if you don't see something that fits your tastes, don't worry, we adapt to your needs.
